name: The Lair of the Mechanist Gnome
name_original: The Lair of the Mechanist Gnome
description:
Explore the workshop of a gnome!

Designed to be played at the same time as you read it, this short adventure can be easily adapted to a classic game. The small background provided makes it easy to invent a sequel.

You can find my other creations dedicated to solo rpg on https://lbrpg.blogspot.com/
